column4: Has anyone else run into problems with ndiswrapper when upgrading from edgy to feisty? My ndiswrapper worked fine on edgy, but when I upgraded to feisty it set it to use the native bcm43xx driver (doesn't support my 4318) and now ndiswrapper won't work
I have the firmware dumped in /lib/firmware and such, but I thought that was for bcm43xx anyway
